message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price that I think is a great value. I'm willing to start with an offer of $9000. This is a competitive price that I'm confident you'll find reasonable, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $8400 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're looking to save a bit more, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit closer to my target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9500. This is a fair compromise that I think you'll find reasonable.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $8800 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering its value to me.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9800. This is my final offer, and I'm not sure I can go any lower.
I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $8600 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
